headline: AppLovin's International Expansion Poised to Supercharge Growth
summary: APP is rolling out its AXON platform globally, targeting Europe and Asia to drive growth beyond its U.S. base.

headline: AppLovin Joins S&P 500 as Cramer Hails Stock’s Strong Growth Momentum
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the 12 Jim Cramer Stock Picks this Week. The stock captures Cramer’s attention following the announcement of its inclusion in the S&P 500. In the financial results announced for the second quarter of 2025, the company reported a revenue of $1.26 billion, a 16.5% year-on-year growth. Though the revenue […]
